transcript: I know, I know, it's hard, but you just gotta keep going. I mean, you've been going at it for so long, you know, there's something is definitely gonna come up. I know it will, because you're a good worker.

I mean, you've been going at it for so long, you know,
there's something is definitely gonna come up.
I know it will, because you're a good worker.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I know.  I know. It's hard, but you just--you gotta keep going.  I mean, you've been going at it for so long, you know.  Something is definitely going to come up.  I-I know it will, because you're a good worker--
